title: What to Listen to in 2022: A Playlist for the Year Ahead
sub_head: New music from FKA Twigs, Mitski, Beach House, Earl Sweatshirt and more offer a sampling of tracks from hotly anticipated albums.
body: Almost two years into the pandemic, it’s hard to say when music will return to normal or even what that might look like. But even as tours are scheduled and canceled and rescheduled again, artists are continuing to write songs and make albums. Here we take a look at some of the most anticipated albums expected over the next few months and spotlight an early track that might hint at the record’s direction.
